1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Simple content type.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Simple
6  ( -- * Simple contents
7    -- ** Boolean
8    CBool (..), true, false, putTrue, putFalse,
9    -- ** Decimal
10    CDec (..), pInt, pInteger, pIntegral, gRational, gIntegral,
11    getRational, getIntegral,
12    -- ** Clock and time
13    CClock (..),
14    CTime (..),
15    -- ** Textual
16    CCode (..),
17    CTerm (..),
18    CText (..), pMaybeText, pTx, pTz,
19  ) where
20
21import qualified Data.Text                               as Tx
22import qualified Data.Text.Lazy                          as Tz
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                as O
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                    as B
25import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                  as S
26import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type                    as T
27import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Edge         as D
28import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Message      as Msg
29
30
31-- ============================================  Simple contents
32
33-- ---------------------------------  Bool
34
35-- | True or false, affirmed or denied.
36class (D.CTypeOf c) => CBool c where
37    isBool      ::       c -> Bool
38    pBool       ::    Bool -> c
39    gBool       ::       c -> Bool
40
41    getBool     ::  D.GetContent Bool c
42    getBool     =   D.getContent isBool gBool
43
44    putBool     ::    Bool -> B.Ab c
45    putBool     =    Right . pBool
46
47-- | Boolean constant true.
48true :: (CBool c) => c
49true  = pBool True
50
51-- | Boolean constant false.
52false :: (CBool c) => c
53false = pBool False
54
55-- | Boolean constant true.
56putTrue :: (CBool c) => B.Ab c
57putTrue  = putBool True
58
59-- | Boolean constant false.
60putFalse :: (CBool c) => B.Ab c
61putFalse = putBool False
62
63-- ---------------------------------  Dec
64
65-- | Decimal number.
66class (D.CTypeOf c) => CDec c where
67    isDec       ::           c -> Bool
68    gDec        ::           c -> T.Decimal
69    pDec        ::   T.Decimal -> c
70
71    getDec      ::     D.GetContent T.Decimal c
72    getDec      =      D.getContent isDec gDec
73
74    putDec      ::   T.Decimal -> B.Ab c
75    putDec      =    Right . pDec
76
77-- | Create decimal content.
78--
79--   >>> pInt 15 :: Content
80--   ContentDec Decimal (0) 15
81--
82pInt :: (CDec c) => Int -> c
83pInt = pIntegral
84
85-- | Create decimal content.
86pInteger :: (CDec c) => Integer -> c
87pInteger = pDec . fromInteger
88
89-- | Create decimal content.
90pIntegral :: (CDec c, Integral n) => n -> c
91pIntegral = pInteger . toInteger
92
93-- | Get rational number from decimal content.
94gRational :: (CDec c) => c -> Rational
95gRational = toRational . gDec
96
97-- | Get rational number from decimal content.
98getRational :: (B.MixEncode c, CDec c) => D.GetContent Rational c
99getRational (Right c) | isDec c  = Right $ gRational c
100getRational (Right c)            = Msg.notDec c
101getRational (Left a)             = Left a
102
103-- | Get truncated integer from decimal content.
104gIntegral :: (CDec c, Integral n) => c -> n
105gIntegral = truncate . gRational
106
107-- | Get truncated integer from decimal content.
108getIntegral :: (B.MixEncode c, CDec c, Integral n) => D.GetContent n c
109getIntegral (Right c) | isDec c  = Right $ gIntegral c
110getIntegral (Right c)            = Msg.notDec c
111getIntegral (Left a)             = Left a
112
113-- ---------------------------------  Clock
114
115-- | Distance between two points in timeline.
116class (D.CTypeOf c) => CClock c where
117    isClock      ::           c -> Bool
118    gClock       ::           c -> T.Clock
119    pClock       ::     T.Clock -> c
120
121    getClock     ::      D.GetContent T.Clock c
122    getClock     =       D.getContent isClock gClock
123
124    putClock     ::     T.Clock -> B.Ab c
125    putClock     =      Right . pClock
126
127-- ---------------------------------  Time
128
129-- | Point in timeline.
130class (D.CTypeOf c) => CTime c where
131    isTime       ::           c -> Bool
132    gTime        ::           c -> T.Time
133    pTime        ::      T.Time -> c
134
135    getTime      ::     D.GetContent T.Time c
136    getTime      =      D.getContent isTime gTime
137
138    putTime      ::   T.Time -> B.Ab c
139    putTime      =    Right . pTime
140
141-- ---------------------------------  Code
142
143-- | Code.
144class (D.CTypeOf c) => CCode c where
145    isCode       ::           c -> Bool
146    gCode        ::           c -> String
147    pCode        ::      String -> c
148
149    getCode      ::      D.GetContent String c
150    getCode      =       D.getContent isCode gCode
151
152    putCode      ::      String -> B.Ab c
153    putCode      =       Right . pCode
154
155-- ---------------------------------  Term
156
157-- | Term name.
158class (D.CTypeOf c) => CTerm c where
159    isTerm       ::           c -> Bool
160    gTerm        ::           c -> S.TermName
161    pTerm        ::  S.TermName -> c
162
163    getTerm      ::      D.GetContent S.TermName c
164    getTerm      =       D.getContent isTerm gTerm
165
166    putTerm      ::  S.TermName -> B.Ab c
167    putTerm      =       Right . pTerm
168
169
170-- ---------------------------------  Text
171
172-- | Double-quoted text content.
173class (D.CTypeOf c) => CText c where
174    isText      :: c -> Bool
175    gText       :: c -> String
176    pText       :: String -> c
177
178    getText     :: D.GetContent String c
179    getText      = D.getContent isText gText
180
181    putText     :: String -> B.Ab c
182    putText      = Right . pText
183
184-- | Create text or empty content.
185--
186--   >>> pMaybeText "a" :: Content
187--   ContentText "a"
188--
189--   >>> pMaybeText "" :: Content
190--   ContentEmpty
191--
192pMaybeText :: (CText c, D.CEmpty c) => String -> c
193pMaybeText s | O.trimBegin s == "" = D.empty
194             | otherwise           = pText s
195
196-- | Create text content from strict text.
197pTx :: (CText c) => Tx.Text -> c
198pTx = pText . Tx.unpack
199
200-- | Create text content from lazy text.
201pTz :: (CText c) => Tz.Text -> c
202pTz = pText . Tz.unpack
203
